mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT NAME , aa.id FROM r_owner aa LEFT JOIN r_owner_property bb ON aa.id = bb.owner_id WHERE aa.comp_id = #{compId} AND bb.comm_id =#{commId}

SELECT r_owner_property.id as prop_id, r_owner_property.type as prop_types, r_owner.* FROM r_owner LEFT JOIN r_owner_property on r_owner_property.owner_id= r_owner.id where r_owner.is_delete=0 and r_owner_property.property_type = '房产' and r_owner_property.property_id = #{roomId}

SELECT s_company.name as comp_name, r_community.name as comm_name, r_comm_area.name as comm_area_name, r_building.name as building_name, r_unit.name as unit_name, r_room.* FROM r_owner_property LEFT JOIN r_room ON r_room.id = r_owner_property.property_id LEFT JOIN s_company on s_company.id = r_room.comp_id LEFT JOIN r_community on r_community.id = r_room.comm_id LEFT JOIN r_comm_area on r_comm_area.id = r_room.comm_area_id LEFT JOIN r_building on r_building.id = r_room.building_id LEFT JOIN r_unit on r_unit.id = r_room.unit_id WHERE r_owner_property.is_delete = 0 AND r_owner_property.property_type = '房产' AND r_owner_property.owner_id =#{ownerId}

SELECT s_company.name as comp_name, r_community.name as comm_name, r_comm_area.name as area_name, r_parking_space.* FROM r_owner_property LEFT JOIN r_parking_space ON r_parking_space.id = r_owner_property.property_id LEFT JOIN s_company on s_company.id = r_parking_space.comp_id LEFT JOIN r_community on r_community.id = r_parking_space.comm_id LEFT JOIN r_comm_area on r_comm_area.id = r_parking_space.comm_area_id WHERE r_owner_property.is_delete = 0 AND r_owner_property.property_type = '停车位' AND r_owner_property.owner_id =#{ownerId}
